system.description: The character is a master of flame weapons, using holy fire to purge the unclean with devastating effectiveness.
system.benefit: Targets of Weapons with the Flame Quality made by Character, suffer -20 to their Agility Test to avoid setting on fire. Additionally, whenever the character inflicts Righteous Fury with a weapon with the Flame Quality, the target is automatically set on fire. (DW) When used against Horde enemies, increases number of hits to the Horde by 1d5.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Flame
specialAbilities.description: Targets of Weapons with the Flame Quality suffer -20 to their Agility Test to avoid setting on fire. Whenever the character inflicts Righteous Fury with a Flame weapon, the target is automatically set on fire. Against Hordes, increases hits by 1d5.
